function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on contagious disease prevention in urban planning","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in densely populated urban areas","Mitigation":"Incorporate contagious disease prevention strategies into urban planning initiatives","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, urban simulation models","People":"Residents of urban areas, urban planners","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and policymakers"},{"Description":"Emerging infectious diseases due to environmental factors","Impact":"Increased risk of new and drug-resistant infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Regulate agricultural intrusion and address global warming and urban heat islands","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring, sensor networks","People":"Global population","Owner":"Environmental agencies, government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on public health in urban development","Impact":"Limited access to facilities and spaces that promote public health","Mitigation":"Incorporate public health considerations into urban development plans and policies","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, health impact assessments","People":"Current and future urban residents","Owner":"Urban development authorities, public health agencies"}]}
